documents.document: Please @pmbillenglish can you let the world know that NZ does not support #MuslimBan ? Sometimes diplomacy means standing up to bullies
I shall be looking to #divestUSA until Trump is deposed or he reverses his executive orders from the last 9 days
Sorry @TeslaMotors but I'd like my money back for my Model3 place. #divestUSA is the only way to respond to your govt's actions

I am heartened by footage of the #WomensMarch This is how you fight Trump's intolerance. Together! My kids will watch tonight's news

@psirides Interesting. I suspected that this was the case but am horrified that it has been tested for up to 14yrs!!?!

@whistlingdixie4 No worries. It was a well written blog which resonated with me.

Thank you for having me #smaccdub
What a fantastic conference. Revolutionising medical CME to make learning fun and engaging.
@lizcrowe2 Ha! Aspirational. Encapsulates the SMACC ethos perfectly
We are complexity scientists - Peter Brindley #smaccdub
Great advice. Tear down the silos and collaborate between locations i.e. ED, ICU, Theatres https://t.co/XLOYBL0kDk
@icmdoc True! Good to optimise preparation/rehearsal for the rare occasion but don’t underestimate how tough it will still be at the time
Easy Peasy…yeah right. As long as you can control your white knuckled fear #smaccdub https://t.co/F7PNZtlNbg
That’s no joke. It’s the truth @psirides #smaccdub https://t.co/fIc3pTDu7Z
@lizcrowe2 @barco030 Was genius holding a pissup in a brewery! Great venue & fantastic night. I couldn’t handle the jandle by 2am #smaccdub
Don’t apologise for explaining data @icuresearch Good to see some at #smaccdub
Packed house for @psirides talk on “Why your hospital is broken” #Wellingtonrepresent #smaccdub
@majorbaps I hope not! We should watch and learn how it's done
@ketaminh Fantastic all female panel to see. Great advertisement for the equity that should already exist.
It's a tribute to the lure of #smaccdub talks that I'm getting up hungover on 4hrs sleep to attend. #FOMO not common at med conferences
@psirides @barco030 @KazemiAlex I echo that sentiment
@ketaminh @unsarcasticone @Akutdok @thomas1973 @barco030 extremely tough. Done admirably but needs feedback reception to improve
@KazemiAlex @barco030 Yup. Brave conversation pointing out commonly expressed issues with Smacc. Many I have spoken to echoes sentiments
The best features of #smaccdub listed: https://t.co/AksNmPV0uL
2 weeks of ICU can save you 1hr of difficult conversation. Gold! @psirides #smaccdub
#smaccdub @psirides killing it with his cage fight. Quoting papers with CPR outcomes from the 24th century involving non humanoids

Let the Smaccfights begin! #smaccdub https://t.co/atIo5iWQnD
